DOC.brief_summary: This study will have 2 parts: Pharmacokinetics (PK) Lead-in Phase and the Treatment Phase. The primary objective of the PK Lead-in Phase is to evaluate the steady state PK and confirm the dose of sofosbuvir/velpatasvir (SOF/VEL) fixed-dose combination (FDC) in pediatric participants with chronic hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection. The primary objective of the Treatment Phase is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of SOF/VEL for 12 weeks in pediatric participants with chronic HCV.
DOC.brief_title: Sofosbuvir/Velpatasvir in Adolescents and Children With Chronic HCV Infection
DOC.criteria: Key Chronic HCVinfected, treatmentnaive and treatmentexperienced adolescent and pediatric individuals aged 3 to < 18 as determined at Day 1. Note: Other protocol defined Inclusion/Exclusion criteria may apply.
